patent_validity: determined solely by its issued terms
procedural_fairness: representations made during patent prosecution cannot alter the patent's scope or create estoppel
appeal_outcome: allowed the appeal, striking out the paragraphs
decision_outcome: Paragraphs relying on patent prosecution history for estoppel were struck out
cause_of_action: Plaintiffs sought to strike out paragraphs in defendants' defense alleging estoppel based on patent prosecution statements
